name: Ruff Landing
description:
Pepe and his faithful mutt Ronnie run a cozy pizza shop, but there's one small problem: The pizza toppings are alive, and out for revenge! This fake NES-esque game was originally a present for user Zombiemode in the Pixonomicon Discord community's 2022 Secret Santa event.

How To Play

Enter launches Ronnie and lets you skip through the intro faster

Left & Right move the platter

Down calls Ronnie back towards the platter. This has a cooldown, you can only use it when the bell icon is visible at the top

The goal is to clear out all the toppings from the board. They'll gradually make their way down from the top, and if they reach the bottom it's game over! You get a bonus life every 500 points, and every time you clear the levels the game will loop with a score multiplier and faster speed. Good luck!

Credits

All code and assets were made by Hugues Ross, except the intro music.

Intro music is "Behind the column" by Snabisch, downloaded from here and used under the Creative Commons BY 3.0 license
